newPool(string,string,address[],int128,i.details: Deprecated in favour of the kappa-based overload below; kept for backwards compatibility.

params.deadline: Reverts if nonzero and the current blocktime is later than the deadline
params.flashFeePpm: fee in parts-per-million, taken for flash loans
params.initialDeposits: amounts of each token to deposit initially
params.name: LP token name
params.payer: address that provides the initial token deposits
params.receiver: address that receives the minted LP tokens
params.stable: if true and assets.length==2, then the optimization for 2-asset stablecoin pools is activated
params.swapFeePpm: fee in parts-per-million, taken from swap input amounts before LMSR calculations
params.targetSlippage: target slippage in 64.64 fixed-point (as used by LMSR)
params.tradeFrac: trade fraction in 64.64 fixed-point (as used by LMSR)

returns.lpAmount: Amount of LP tokens minted to the receiver
returns.pool: Address of the newly created and initialized PartyPool

params.deadline: Reverts if nonzero and the current blocktime is later than the deadline
params.flashFeePpm: fee in parts-per-million, taken for flash loans
params.initialDeposits: amounts of each token to deposit initially
params.kappa: liquidity parameter κ in 64.64 fixed-point used to derive b = κ * S(q)
params.name: LP token name
params.payer: address that provides the initial token deposits
params.receiver: address that receives the minted LP tokens
params.stable: if true and assets.length==2, then the optimization for 2-asset stablecoin pools is activated
params.swapFeePpm: fee in parts-per-million, taken from swap input amounts before LMSR calculations

returns.lpAmount: Amount of LP tokens minted to the receiver
returns.pool: Address of the newly created and initialized PartyPool

params.deadline: Reverts if nonzero and the current blocktime is later than the deadline
params.flashFeePpm: fee in parts-per-million, taken for flash loans
params.initialDeposits: amounts of each token to deposit initially
params.kappa: liquidity parameter κ in 64.64 fixed-point used to derive b = κ * S(q)
params.name: LP token name
params.payer: address that provides the initial token deposits
params.receiver: address that receives the minted LP tokens
params.stable: if true and assets.length==2, then the optimization for 2-asset stablecoin pools is activated
params.swapFeesPpm: per-asset fees in parts-per-million, taken from swap input amounts before LMSR calculations

returns.lpAmount: Amount of LP tokens minted to the receiver
returns.pool: Address of the newly created and initialized PartyPool

returns._0: The total count of pools containing the token
The total count of unique tokens

getAllPools(uint256,uint256).notice: Retrieves a page of pool addresses

getAllTokens(uint256,uint256).notice: Retrieves a page of token addresses

getPoolSupported(address).notice: Checks if a pool is supported

getPoolsByToken(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Retrieves a page of pool addresses for a specific token

mintImpl().notice: Address of the mint implementation contract used by all pools created by this factory

newPool(string,string,address[],int128,i.notice: Creates a new PartyPool instance and initializes it with initial deposits (legacy signature).

newPool(string,string,address[],int128,u.notice: Creates a new PartyPool instance and initializes it with initial deposits (kappa-based).
Primary method for creating a new pool. May only be called by the PartyPlanner owner account.

poolCount().notice: Returns the total number of pools created

poolsByTokenCount(address).notice: Returns the total number of pools for a specific token

swapImpl().notice: Address of the swap implementation contract used by all pools created by this factory

tokenCount().notice: Returns the total number of unique tokens
